mapper.select: SELECT p.*, o.STOCK, CATEGORY_NAME FROM t3_tbl_product p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO, SUM(PRODUCT_STOCK) STOCK FROM t3_tbl_product_option GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ) o ON p.PRODUCT_NO = o.PRODUCT_NO INNER JOIN t3_tbl_product_category c ON p.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO
SELECT * FROM t3_tbl_product p LEFT JOIN t3_tbl_product_option o ON p.PRODUCT_NO = o.PRODUCT_NO WHERE p.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE t3_tbl_product SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice}, DISCOUNT = #{discount}, DISCOUNT_YN = #{discountYn}, UDATETIME = now() WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t3_tbl_product_option(PRODUCT_NO, OPTION_NAME, OPTION_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK) VALUES(#{productNo}, #{optionName}, #{optionPrice}, #{productStock})
